TextLibrary.Text: Will ye look at this, lad! 'Tis part o' the Great Machine...

Will ye look at this, lass! 'Tis part o' the Great Machine...
Will ye look at this, lass! 'Tis part o' the Great Machine...
No no no no no... 'Tis much more than that. Look at the perfect circularity o' the wheel and the delicate milled chamfer o' the edges. 'Tis a thing o' beauty, like nothin' I've ever...

I think I'll leave you two alone to get acquainted...
